file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 53-21-02-07 - MAIN-DOOR FRAME ROLLERS - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR FRAME ROLLERS - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to clean the main-door frame rollers. B. There are four rollers at the main-door frame. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MAIN-DOOR FRAME ROLLERS - CLEAN- ALL 53-21-02-100-801-A ♦ ING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 53-21-02 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-21-02-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MAIN-DOOR FRAME ROLLERS - CLEANING A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to clean the main-door frame rollers. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MIL-C-16173, GR3 WD40 Lubricant AR ASTM-D-740 Methyl-Ethyl-Ketone (MEK) AR F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main-door frame H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the main door. I. Cleaning of Main-Door Frame Rollers (Figure 701) SUBTASK 140-002-A WARNING: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE THE METHYL-ETHYL-KETONE (MEK). PUT ON SAFETY GOGGLES, PROTECTIVE GLOVES AND CLOTHING. DO NOT BREATHE THE GAS. DO THE WORK IN AN AREA WHICH HAS A GOOD FLOW OF AIR. THE METHYL-ETHYL-KETONE (MEK) IS POISONOUS AND HIGHLY FLAMMABLE. (1) Clean the rollers and their supports with a clean cloth soaked with solvent MEK. (2) Lubricate the rollers and their supports with WD40. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 53-21-02 Page 2 of 3 Rev 52 - Apr 28/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the main door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 53-21-02 Page 3 of 3 Rev 52 - Apr 28/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
